title: Koisuru Idol Ryuusei-Kun Wa Kujikenai!
alternative_title: Koisuru Idol Ryusei-kun wa Kujikenai ; Koisuru Idol Ryusei-kun wa Kujikenai! ; Lovesick Idol Ryusei-kun Won't Give Up! ; Lovesick Idol Ryuusei-kun Won't Give Up! ; 恋するアイドル流星くんはくじけない！
status: Koisuru Idol Ryusei-kun wa Kujikenai ; Koisuru Idol Ryusei-kun wa Kujikenai! ; Lovesick Idol Ryusei-kun Won't Give Up! ; Lovesick Idol Ryuusei-kun Won't Give Up! ; 恋するアイドル流星くんはくじけない！
description:
Description :
        Ryusei, a handsome idol who is rapidly gaining popularity, has a crush on his childhood friend Daichi. However, Daichi is obsessed with the ``idol Ryusei,'' and even when he approaches him, he doesn't turn around. On the other hand, Daichi also secretly has a crush on Ryusei, but he hides his romantic feelings for him and supports "everyone's idol Ryusei"...?? A love story between a popular idol and a healthy childhood friend, with mutual unrequited love ?+
